registry.name: Nostr Directory
registry.description: Add your nostr public key to the directory so your followers can find you

registry.name: Nostr Watch
registry.description: Nostr relays and the network in general to assist users, developers and relay operators alike

registry.name: Nostr IO
registry.description: It collects events from all known relays. Check out the network stats page

registry.name: Nostr Gateway
registry.description: It is an effort to pull Nostr data from relays around the nostrsphere into HTML pages for the consumption of the unnostrinitiated.
